title: Bloke already wins Halloween with epic Coleen Rooney Instagram account costume
text:

As war of the WAGs rages on, one absolute legend is making light of the situation.

The man, Kieran Nuge (@_knuge), took to Twitter with an Instagram and scandal-inspired costume that's sure to make some howl with laughter and others scratch their heads.

Over his chest, Kieran hangs a board depicting Coleen Rooney's private Instagram account, several newsworthy stories and a message listing Rebekah Vardy as a viewer.

The costume's a reference to the WAGatha Christie scandal, in which Wayne Rooney's wife Coleen determined with some super detective skills that Rebekah Vardy, wife of Jamie Vardy, was allegedly leaking her stories to the press.

(Image: Twitter/@_knuge)

Kieran's followers are loving the humour, with one calling it early as the "best Halloween costume of 2019."

Another laughed: "The rest of Halloween can just go home. But at the same time, I'm now waiting for a #WagathaChristie costume to surface."

A third called Kieran a "genius", with a fourth writing that he had achieved "peak Internet."

Coleen suspected it might be Becky who was telling the press about the stories she posted about on her private Instagram.

(Image: Getty Images)

(Image: Ken McKay/ITV/REX/Shutterstock)

Slowly deleting more and more people from her account, Coleen was left with just Becky - now Coleen claims it was her all along, an accusation that Becky denies.

Mum of four Coleen crafted a public outing of Becky's alleged leaks by taking to Twitter and penning a lengthy post.

She explained: "After a long time of trying to figure out who it could be, for various reasons, I had a suspicion.

"To try and prove this, I came up with an idea. I blocked everyone from viewing my Instagram stories except ONE account. (Those on my private account must have been wondering why I haven't had stories on there for a while.)"

Later in the post, she concluded: "I have saved and screenshotted all the original stories which clearly show just one person has viewed them.

"It's...Rebekah Vardy's account."
description: Kieran's costume shows him with a number of 'private' stories on his chest with a notice saying Rebekah Vardy had seen them
